message: I'll take 90% and leave you with 10%.  Fair enough, right?  This way, we both get something and we can move on with our lives.
I'll give you a decent share, but I'm not giving you 90%!
Okay, I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 55/45.  We're both losing money with each round, so let's get this over with.
You're getting greedy, Alice. I'll give you a smaller share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
